summary: Tested AI SEO Growth Engine - Content Engine and ASO Engine. All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend admin login, dashboard, Content Engine (all 4 tabs), and ASO Engine (all 5 tabs) working correctly.
seed_data_creation: 2 blog posts already exist (Used Cars in Dar es Salaam, Buying Used Phones in Dar es Salaam)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Growth Engine fully tested. Content Engine page has 4 tabs (Generate Content, Blog Posts, AI Search AEO, Suggestions). ASO Engine page has 5 tabs (Google Play, App Store, Keywords, Competitors, History). Both pages load correctly after admin login. AI content generation with GPT-5.2 is working - 2 test posts were successfully generated previously.
tests_passed: Backend: Admin login with valid credentials returns access_token and admin data
Backend: Admin login with invalid credentials returns 401
Backend: /api/growth/content/analytics requires authentication
Backend: /api/growth/content/analytics returns valid data structure (total_posts, published_posts, draft_posts, by_country, by_category, recent_posts)
Backend: /api/growth/content/posts returns posts list without auth
Backend: /api/growth/content/posts supports status/category filters
Backend: Blog post response structure is valid
Backend: /api/growth/content/suggestions requires authentication
Backend: /api/growth/content/suggestions returns valid suggestions
Backend: /api/growth/content/aeo-questions returns predefined questions
Backend: /api/growth/aso/metadata endpoint works
Backend: /api/growth/aso/analytics/summary returns impressions/installs/ctr
Backend: /api/growth/aso/keywords/{region} works for TZ, KE, DE
Backend: /api/growth/aso/competitor-analysis/{region} returns competitors and insights
Backend: /api/growth/content/generate-post requires authentication
Backend: /api/growth/content/generate-post validates required fields
Frontend: Admin login page loads with email/password form
Frontend: Admin login with correct credentials navigates to dashboard
Frontend: Dashboard Overview shows User Growth chart, Listings by Category chart
Frontend: Content Engine page loads with correct title and description
Frontend: Content Engine shows stats - Total Posts (2), Published (0), Drafts (2), This Week (2)
Frontend: Content Engine has 4 tabs - Generate Content, Blog Posts, AI Search (AEO), Suggestions
Frontend: Generate Content tab shows form with Topic, Template Type, Target Country, Category, Language, Keywords, Word Count fields
Frontend: Blog Posts tab shows table with 2 posts - correct columns Title, Category, Country, Status, Words, Created, Actions
Frontend: Blog Posts action buttons (Edit, Publish, Delete) are visible
Frontend: AI Search (AEO) tab shows Generate AI-Search Optimized Content form
Frontend: AI Search (AEO) tab shows 10 Quick Generate question chips
Frontend: Suggestions tab shows 7 content suggestion cards with priority, country, keywords, and Generate This button
Frontend: ASO Engine page loads with correct title and description
Frontend: ASO Engine shows stats - Total Impressions, Total Installs, Average CTR, Metadata Versions
Frontend: ASO Engine has 5 tabs - Google Play, App Store, Keywords, Competitors, History
Frontend: Google Play tab shows Generate Google Play Listing form with Target Region, Language, Focus Keywords

content_engine.stats_display: Working - shows 2 total posts, 0 published, 2 drafts
content_engine.generate_form: Working - all form fields present and functional
content_engine.blog_posts_table: Working - shows 2 posts with correct data
content_engine.aeo_tab: Working - topic input and 10 predefined questions available

admin_auth.protected_routes: Working - Content Engine and ASO Engine require authentication
